ValidationRule.description: BODEV-1972: Products should be already added in the opportunity before moving to the VOC stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type,"New Business-Enterprise Cloud"),ISPICKVAL(Type,"New Business - Expansion Portal")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), of_opportunity_products__c = 0, ISCHANGED(StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "VOC"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Legal Review"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Signature Stage"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add opportunity products. Products should be added before the VOC stage.
